results.title: U.S. and Egypt Put Improving Egypt’s Human Rights on the Agenda

results.abstract: During the Cold War, she fought for the rights of others and waged a 16-year fight of her own for an exit visa to Israel. She finally won in 1987.

results.title: A Spiraling Power Struggle? That Is the Least of Many Haitians’ Concerns.

des_facet: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

multimedia.caption: The Welikada Prison in Colombo, Sri Lanka. Lohan Ratwatte, the state minister for prison management and prisoners’ rehabilitation, was accused of entering it this month while intoxicated.
